description: My academic background and certifications that support my experience as a full stack developer.
description_1: Intensive training focused on building real-world web applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, TypeScript, MySQL and PostgreSQL. Includes agile methodologies and software development best practices.
description_2: Training in frontend and web design using HTML5, CSS3, Responsive Design, Figma, SASS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap 5, WordPress, Git and GitHub.
description_3: Five years of studies focused on design, creativity, technical work, and structured thinking.
description_4: One-year English training focused on oral communication, listening, and writing. Level achieved: Intermediate–Advanced.
description_5: Certification supporting advanced English communication skills for professional contexts.
continuous_learning_desc: Always learning new technologies through courses, bootcamps, and real-world projects.
